items.text: dabs this from the crease to the off side.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, no run

items.text: shapes to drive, goes through but no timing.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, no run

items.text: fetches the pull from outside off towards deep midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, 2 runs

items.preText: Maruf: "Although couple of wickets are gone, West Indies are still en route to build a nice innings if they play responsibly. 250 should be a good enough score to make Bangladesh question themselves during chase. "
items.text: slower and fuller on off, dabbed towards point for a quick single
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, 1 run

items.text: mistimes a heave towards deep midwicket off a thick inside edge.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.preText: Mehidy is back into the attack
items.text: beauty. Drew him forward in flight, and then got this to dip and beat the edge. Fortunately managed to drag his backfoot in time.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: squirted to short third man, quick single taken.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: fired full, he lunges forward and blocks
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, no run

items.text: defended with soft hands again as he stretches forward
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, no run

items.text: driven to long-off as they jog the single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, 1 run

items.text: this is a terrific pick up shot. Rocks back and deposits the pull on the bounce to the deep midwicket fence
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, FOUR runs

items.text: angles back in to beat the inside edge and hit the thigh pad as he looks to work to the leg side
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, no run

items.text: works this to mid-on as they scamper a quick single
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, 1 run

items.text: slower and fuller on middle, defends with bat close to the pad
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: stands tall and bunts this into the off side
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: gentle push towards mid-odd as they steal another run
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: looks to play a short arm jab over midwicket, misses. They scamper a legbye even as the bowler is caught napping.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, 1 leg bye

items.text: worked with the spin into the gap at wide long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, 2 runs

items.text: steps out and drills this to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, 1 run

items.text: firm square drive to deep cover point
items.postText: Simeon: "Hetmeyer is in pretty good form. He also seems like one of the only batsmen in the Windies team that isn't afraid to play shots.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: fired full on the stumps, blocked.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, no run

items.text: right to the pitch as he eases this to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, 1 run

items.text: rocks back and punches to deep cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: drops short and punished. Hetmyer rocks back and muscles this to clear deep midwicket. Top shot
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hetmyer, SIX runs

items.text: drifts a full delivery into middle and leg, turned to deep square
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hetmyer, 1 run
